appDescription.message: Recognize medical terms in Web documents and provide definitions, related concepts and external references for a better search!

automaticProcess.message: Pages are being automatically translated. You can change the execution mode in the extension's settings.
automaticProcess.description: Title of the browser action when execution mode is automatic.

manualProcess.message: Click here to translate this page. You can change the execution mode in the extension's settings.
manualProcess.description: Title of the browser action when execution mode is manual.
